addLayer(android.graphics.Paint, float,.Description: Add a new layer (above any previous layers) to the rasterizer. The layer will extract those fields that affect the mask from the specified paint, but will not retain a reference to the paint object itself, so it may be reused without danger of side-effects.
addLayer(android.graphics.Paint, float,.FullName: void addLayer (Paint paint, float dx, float dy)
